Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1982...
Released by St. Louis on 2/20/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/25/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 4/29/1983 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/6/1983 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1984, off Randy Jones (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/21/1984, off Mike Scott (CIN)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF K. Gibson, P D. Stewart. Going to CHW: LF M. Greenwell, RF J. Buhner, CF L. Dykstra, P G. Swindell, 1B F. Stubbs)...
Injured on 7/15/1989 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 3 weeks...
